mapper.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T.MONDATE) ROWNU, MONDATE,
MAX(CASE WHEN T.SNAME=#{SNAMES} THEN ${PULL} END) AS "${SNAMES}"
FROM( SELECT LEFT(T1.EVERY_TIME,16) AS MONDATE, T2.AQI , T2.PM25, T2.PM10, T2.O3 , T2.SO2, T2.NO2, T2.CO, T1.REGIONNAME AS SNAME FROM ( SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR (100), DATEADD(hour, NUMBER, CAST(#{beginDate}+':00:00' AS DATETIME)),20) AS EVERY_TIME,M.REGIONNAME FROM MASTER..SPT_VALUES N,( SELECT SNAME AS REGIONNAME FROM TENVAIR.T_CONFIG_TYPE_REGION_INFO WHERE TYPECODE IN('6','7','8','9','99') ) M WHERE N.TYPE = 'P' AND DATEADD(hour, NUMBER, CAST(#{beginDate}+':00:00' AS DATETIME)) <= CAST(#{endDate}+':00:00' AS DATETIME) )T1 LEFT JOIN( SELECT POINTNAME AS SNAME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),AQI) AS AQI, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PM2_5) AS PM25, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PM10 ) AS PM10, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),SO2 ) AS SO2, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),NO2 ) AS NO2, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(DECIMAL(3,1),CO)) AS CO, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),O3 ) AS O3, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),MONITORTIME,20) as MONDATE FROM TENVAIR.T_ENV_AIRDATA_POINT_HOUR WHERE MONITORTIME BETWEEN #{beginDate}+':00:00' AND #{endDate}+':00:00' )T2 ON T1.EVERY_TIME = T2.MONDATE AND T1.REGIONNAME = T2.SNAME WHERE T1.REGIONNAME IN
#{SNAMES} ) T GROUP BY MONDATE ORDER BY MONDATE

SELECT CASE WHEN SNAME ='郫县' then '郫都区' when SNAME ='都江堰' then '都江堰市' else SNAME end AS SNAME CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),AQI ) AS AQI, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PM25 ) AS PM25, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PM10 ) AS PM10, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),O3 ) AS O3, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),SO2 ) AS SO2, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),NO2 ) AS NO2, CONVERT(DECIMAL(3,1),CO ) AS CO,
convert(VARCHAR(5),MONDATE,108) as MONDATEse> FROM CDJ.V_AIRMONITOR_DATAS WHERE DATATYPE =#{DATATYPE} AND TIMETYPE =#{TIMETYPE} AND
MONDATE BETWEEN #{beginDate}+':00:00' AND #{endDate}+':00:00'
AND SNAME IN #{SNAMES}ORDER BY T.EVERY_TIME,SNAME
SELECT CASE WHEN REGIONCODE = '510100000000' THEN '全部' ELSE REGIONNAME END AS NAME FROM TENVAIR.T_REGION_INFO WHERE PARENTCODE = #{parentCode} ORDER BY REGIONCODE

SELECT TOP 2 T.DIR_POINT_CODE CODE, C.SNAME AS NAME, T.DISTANCE FROM ( SELECT A.SOURCE_POINT_CODE AS SCODE, B.SNAME AS SNAEM, A.DIR_POINT_CODE, A.DIR_TYPE, A.DISTANCE FROM DBO.T_POINT_DIS_CONFIG A INNER JOIN TENVAIR.T_CONFIG_TYPE_REGION_INFO B ON A.SOURCE_POINT_CODE = B.SCODE AND A.SOURCE_TYPE = B.TYPECODE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SNAME = #{sName} ) T INNER JOIN TENVAIR.T_CONFIG_TYPE_REGION_INFO C ON CAST(T.DIR_POINT_CODE AS VARCHAR) = C.SCODE AND T.DIR_TYPE = C.TYPECODE ORDER BY T.DISTANCE ASC
SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),MAX(MONITORTIME),20) MAXTIME FROM TENVAIR.T_ENV_AIRDATA_POINT_HOUR WHERE POINTNAME IN #{SNAMES}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T.MONDATE) ROWNU, MONDATE,
MAX(CASE WHEN T.SNAME=#{SNAMES} THEN ${PULL} END) AS "${SNAMES}"
FROM( SELECT LEFT(T1.EVERY_TIME,16) AS MONDATE, T2.AQI , T2.PM25, T2.PM10, T2.O3 , T2.SO2, T2.NO2, T2.CO, T1.REGIONNAME AS SNAME FROM ( SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR (100), DATEADD(hour, NUMBER, CAST(#{beginDate}+':00:00' AS DATETIME)),20) AS EVERY_TIME,M.REGIONNAME FROM MASTER..SPT_VALUES N,( SELECT SNAME AS REGIONNAME FROM TENVAIR.T_CONFIG_TYPE_REGION_INFO WHERE TYPECODE IN('6','7','8','9','99') ) M WHERE N.TYPE = 'P' AND DATEADD(hour, NUMBER, CAST(#{beginDate}+':00:00' AS DATETIME)) <= CAST(#{endDate}+':00:00' AS DATETIME) )T1 LEFT JOIN( SELECT POINTNAME AS SNAME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),AQI) AS AQI, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PM2_5) AS PM25, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PM10 ) AS PM10, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),SO2 ) AS SO2, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),NO2 ) AS NO2, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(DECIMAL(3,1),CO)) AS CO, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),O3 ) AS O3, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),MONITORTIME,20) as MONDATE FROM TENVAIR.T_ENV_AIRDATA_POINT_HOUR WHERE MONITORTIME BETWEEN #{beginDate}+':00:00' AND #{endDate}+':00:00' )T2 ON T1.EVERY_TIME = T2.MONDATE AND T1.REGIONNAME = T2.SNAME WHERE T1.REGIONNAME IN
#{SNAMES} ) T GROUP BY MONDATE ORDER BY MONDATE
